articles.title: India orders Musk’s X to fix Grok over ‘obscene’ AI content

articles.content: India's IT ministry has given X 72 hours to submit an action-taken report.

articles.title: Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for resilience
articles.description: As enterprises accelerate their move toward autonomous workflows powered by artificial intelligence, the urgent need for robust AI agent governance has become a critical operational mandate. An agent’s potential relies on the fact that they can perform higher-level tasks, including assuming identities and executing business processes. But if that is compromised, attackers have effectively hijacked […] The post Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for...

articles.content: As enterprises accelerate their move toward autonomous workflows powered by artificial intelligence, the urgent need for robust AI agent governance has become a critical operational mandate. An agent’s potential relies on the fact that they can perform higher-level tasks, including assuming identities and executing business processes. articles.title: Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents
articles.description: Recursive Language Models aim to break the usual trade off between context length, accuracy and cost in large language models. Instead of forcing a model to read a giant prompt in one pass, RLMs treat the prompt as an external environment and let the model decide how to inspect it with code, then recursively call […] The post Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents appeared first on MarkTechPost.
articles.author: Asif Razzaq
articles.content: Recursive Language Models aim to break the usual trade off between context length, accuracy and cost in large language models. Instead of forcing a model to read a giant prompt in one pass, RLMs treat the prompt as an external environment and let the model decide how to inspect it with code, then recursively call […] The post Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents appeared first on MarkTechPost.

articles.title: Accelerate Enterprise AI Development using Weights & Biases and Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
articles.description: In this post, we demonstrate how to use Foundation Models (FMs) from Amazon Bedrock and the newly launched Amazon Bedrock AgentCore alongside W&B Weave to help build, evaluate, and monitor enterprise AI solutions. We cover the complete development lifecycle from tracking individual FM calls to monitoring complex agent workflows in production.
articles.author: James Yi
articles.content: In this post, we demonstrate how to use Foundation Models (FMs) from Amazon Bedrock and the newly launched Amazon Bedrock AgentCore alongside W&B Weave to help build, evaluate, and monitor enterprise AI solutions. We cover the complete development lifecycle from tracking individual FM calls to monitoring complex agent workflows in production.

articles.title: Move Beyond Chain-of-Thought with Chain-of-Draft on Amazon Bedrock
articles.description: This post explores Chain-of-Draft (CoD), an innovative prompting technique introduced in a Zoom AI Research paper Chain of Draft: Thinking Faster by Writing Less, that revolutionizes how models approach reasoning tasks. While Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting has been the go-to method for enhancing model reasoning, CoD offers a more efficient alternative that mirrors human problem-solving patterns—using concise, high-signal thinking steps rather than verbose explanations.
articles.author: Ahmed Raafat
articles.content: This post explores Chain-of-Draft (CoD), an innovative prompting technique introduced in a Zoom AI Research paper Chain of Draft: Thinking Faster by Writing Less, that revolutionizes how models approach reasoning tasks. While Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting has been the go-to method for enhancing model reasoning, CoD offers a more efficient alternative that mirrors human problem-solving patterns—using concise, high-signal thinking steps rather than verbose explanations.

articles.title: NIH-led study reveals role of mobile DNA elements in lung cancer progression
articles.description: Sherlock-Lung study researchers use large-scale, multi-omics analysis to identify biomarker of aggressive lung tumors.
articles.content: Sherlock-Lung study researchers use large-scale, multi-omics analysis to identify biomarker of aggressive lung tumors.

articles.title: Enhance document analytics with Strands AI Agents for the GenAI IDP Accelerator
articles.description: To address the need for businesses to quickly analyze information and unlock actionable insights, we are announcing Analytics Agent, a new feature that is seamlessly integrated into the GenAI IDP Accelerator. With this feature, users can perform advanced searches and complex analyses using natural language queries without SQL or data analysis expertise. In this post, we discuss how non-technical users can use this tool to analyze and understand the documents they have processed at scale with...
articles.author: David Kaleko

In this post, we discuss how non-technical users can use this tool to analyze and understand the documents they have processed at scale with...

articles.title: Nvidia races to fill 2 million chip shortfall for Chinese tech giants
articles.description: Following approval by the Trump administration, Nvidia is ramping up production of H200 AI chips after China ordered over 2 million units, while the company holds only 700,000 in stock and seeks TSMC’s assistance to meet demand, according to Reuters. The U.S. approval enabled exports of Nvidia’s H200 processors to China, prompting the immediate placement […]
articles.author: Kerem Gülen

The U.S. approval enabled exports of Nvidia’s H200 processors to China, prompting the immediate placement […]

articles.title: Optimizing LLM inference on Amazon SageMaker AI with BentoML’s LLM- Optimizer
articles.description: In this post, we demonstrate how to optimize large language model (LLM) inference on Amazon SageMaker AI using BentoML's LLM-Optimizer to systematically identify the best serving configurations for your workload.
articles.author: Josh Longenecker
articles.content: In this post, we demonstrate how to optimize large language model (LLM) inference on Amazon SageMaker AI using BentoML's LLM-Optimizer to systematically identify the best serving configurations for your workload.

articles.title: Glean’s Work AI Institute identifies 5 core AI tensions
articles.description: Global leaders are grappling with five core tensions as artificial intelligence (AI) integrates into workplaces, according to insights from over 100 builders, executives, investors, advisors, and researchers. These tensions encompass the relationship between experts and novices, centralization versus decentralization in governance, the impact of AI on hierarchical structures, the balance between speed and deliberate implementation, […]

articles.title: Announcing OpenAI Grove Cohort 2
articles.description: Applications are now open for OpenAI Grove Cohort 2, a 5-week founder program designed for individuals at any stage, from pre-idea to product. Participants receive $50K in API credits, early access to AI tools, and hands-on mentorship from the OpenAI team.
articles.content: Applications are now open for OpenAI Grove Cohort 2, a 5-week founder program designed for individuals at any stage, from pre-idea to product. Participants receive $50K in API credits, early access to AI tools, and hands-on mentorship from the OpenAI team.
